name: Carlo Maria Abate
introduction: Carlo Maria Abate (born 10 July 1932 and died 29 April 2019), was an Italian former auto racing driver. He was one of the best Ferrari 250 GTO specialists. Abate preferred to be addressed as "Carlo Mario Abate" instead of his christened name. When listed by surname, Abate is alphabetically the first Formula 1 driver.
